ComicInfo.Summary: "PATH TO EMPIRE" Julien's investigation into the mystery of the Grail leads him to a opulent party where he and the Duke of Lorraine finally meet. Romantic sparks begin to fly between Julien and Lorraine's daughter ? much to the annoyance of Genevieve, Julien's old flame! Meanwhile, the world slips further and further towards war...
ComicInfo.Title: Path to Empire
